tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr.Amudha Hari is an amazing doctor. I had visited her before delivery and during.. She is calm and friendly.. Made my family and me feel safe all through the pregnancy journey‚Ä¶ I wanted to deliver normal and though the labour was 24 hour long, she waited patiently and helped me deliver normally. Dr. was more like a mother comforting during the entire time‚Ä¶ If I have another baby, I will go only to Dr. Amudha Hari.  *** ** *** *****

tags: None
review: I am very glad that I chose Dr Amudha Hari. we were new here and had no elders in the family amd it was my first pregnancy; but the right doctor is all you need. I liked her approach as a doctor. I just had calcium, iron, foluc acid n vitamin C supplements throughout my pregnancy. she did not give me any medicine unnecessarily, not even antacids and rather suggested simple home remedies. Even with few complications, my pregnancy became easy to sail through and last month, I gave birth to a healthy boy through normal delivery. Really thank and appreciate her for good work and guidance. I highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnant Women Counseling,Pregnancy Scan,
review:
I was new in Chennai and didn‚Äôt have any reference of a doctor when I conceived my second child last year August. I found Dr. Amudha on Practo and she was my mentor, guide and support in the 9 months that followed and even after. She is highly experienced and because of that she has an immensely calming effect on the patient. She does not panic and does not let you do so too, in any situation. She is risk averse and will help you to avoid situations like that. 
Even before delivery she guided us step by step about all the formalities so that our delivery and post delivery experience was super smooth! 
When my son was born this April, she held my hand figuratively and literally and I couldn't have asked for more. She is amazing. 
I highly recommend her to anyone looking for an excellent OBGYN.

review: We had a video consultation. The doctor didn't even listen to our problem.Without even listening to the problem, she directly prescribed tests and asked us to consult her after taking the test..Looks like she was busy in her onclinic appointment.Taking the test is fine but doctor chould have first spoken to us so that first we would have explained her our issues.. Completely dissatisfied..

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
**** **** ******** She had visited An Alwarpet  Hospital for my wife consultation from A far place ..! Her fees was 700 , not 400 as mentioned here ‚Ä¶.! I came in an emergency-‚Ä¶! *** ****** *** ** **** **** ** **** ******* ********** *** *** **** ************ ** *** **! She asked my wife to repeat the values and inform over phone .! Eventually she left us saying , the situation is ‚ÄòTRICKY‚Äô‚Ä¶‚Ä¶! 

        Not to defame her, but do you think any professional doctor will do that
